sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {Table,Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {USDFormat} from '../libs/numberFormat' import {Deposit} from './Deposit' import {Withdraw} from './Withdraw' import config from '../config'; import NPVChart from './NPVChart' class Summary extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ pnl:0.0, npv:0.0, cashDep:0.0, amountAlloc:0.0, usagePer:"0.0%", amountFree:0.0 } } render (){ console.log("Summary render") console.log(this.props) return (
Profit/Loss {USDFormat(this.state.pnl)}
NPV {USDFormat(this.state.npv)}
Cash Deposited    {USDFormat(this.state.cashDep)}
Amount Allocated {USDFormat(this.state.amountAlloc)}
Usage (%) {this.state.usagePer}
Amount Free    {USDFormat(this.state.amountFree)}
); } } export default Summary;
